ASCII Image Converter

2019 · ascii, python, cv2, image, team

Over the summer, I worked on several small projects with a close friend of mine, Josh. This script takes an image as input and outputs text files filled with characters having different pixel densities to recreate the image. After our initial pass programming this script, we spent time optimizing, being able to process an 8.5mb file in under ten minutes (thatâ€™s 4032x3024 pixels). Clicking these images redirects to text documents, but you can also see some more on my github.
